title: Kale Spinach and Pear Smoothie
directions: Remove kale leaves from their rough center stalk and coarsely chop. In a blender, combine kale spinach and almond milk. Blend until no big kale bits remain. Stop blender and add banana honey and pear. Blend until smooth. Enjoy immediately. Heck yea!
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups cold almond milk (or soy milk or orange juice)
